head.title: Jazz; As 2001 Beckons, Noisemakers (From Funk to Salsa) Cavort

hedline.hl1: Jazz; As 2001 Beckons, Noisemakers (From Funk to Salsa) Cavort

block.p: * HAMIET BLUIETT GROUP. Sista's Place, 456 Nostrand Avenue, Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, (718) 398-1766. What a sound Mr. Bluiett has on the baritone saxophone, and what ruckus he can kick up when he's stalking a good time. A longtime member of the World Saxophone Quartet, he has been a local favorite since the 70's; he is still hiring good young musicians and creating converts. At 9:30 p.m.; admission is $35 for one person, $50 for two.

* HAMIET BLUIETT GROUP. Sista's Place, 456 Nostrand Avenue, Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, (718) 398-1766. What a sound Mr. Bluiett has on the baritone saxophone, and what ruckus he can kick up when he's stalking a good time. A longtime member of the World Saxophone Quartet, he has been a local favorite since the 70's; he is still hiring good young musicians and creating converts. At 9:30 p.m.; admission is $35 for one person, $50 for two.
